generalInfo: Ready for a thrill that goes beyond the ordinary cruise? If the idea of being cooped up on a boat doesn't quite set your soul sailing, get ready to be amazed by our Galapagos Adventure Program! Say goodbye to run-of-the-mill cruise tours and wave hello to a whole new level of excitement. This program is your ticket to not just exploring, but making a real difference in the amazing wildlife, diving headfirst into local culture, bonding with welcoming communities, and island hopping like a true explorer. Enjoy an  array of exhilarating tours that'll have you grinning from ear to ear!

dayInfo.description: Welcome to the adventure! As soon as you touch down on Baltra Island, a friendly driver will be there to help you up from the airport and transfer you to the lively harbor in Puerto Ayora on Santa Cruz Island. There you can find different options of restaurnts and coffe shops. In the afternoon you'll hop on a ferry that's your ticket to Isabela Island (the ride takes about 2 hours, so bring some snacks and tunes!). When you roll in during the afternoon, your trusty contact person will be at the Isabela harbor to give you a warm welcome and take you to your cozy hotel. Note: Passengers should arrive by 11:00 am at the latest at Baltra Airport (GPS) to guarantee this first day, otherwise we recommend arriving in Santa Cruz one day before the tour.

Today you have to choose between two awesome spots. The first option is Sierra Negra and Chico Volcanoes. Get those hiking boots ready, 'cause you're in for a 6-7 hour trek that'll have your heart pumping and your spirits soaring. Trust us, every step will be worth it once you catch those island views that'll take your breath away. Tintoreras, it's a must-visit destination for nature enthusiasts and wildlife lovers. This unique site offers an extraordinary opportunity to get up close and personal with an incredible array of marine life, including the iconic Galapagos penguins, marine iguanas, and white-tipped reef sharks.

It's a day to visit Santa Cruz. It will be at 7 AM. This island is like the heart of the Archipelago, with hotels and all things touristy. Once you're there, it's off to a ranch in the island's lush highlands. You will see them in their natural habitat. And guess what? Dark lava tunnels are up next – and our guide's got some awesome origin stories about this island that'll blow your mind. In the afternoon, we're off to the incredible Charles Darwin Station, where giant tortoises and land iguanas are living their best lives thanks to some awesome breeding programs. The rest of the afternoon is all yours to explore Ayora Port at your own pace.

Today the next adventure is toward Santa Fé Island. We're talking about a day that's all about island vibes and underwater wonders. Here you'll be snorkeling among the coolest marine creatures, kicking back on the boat while soaking in the stunning views around you. Plus, we're going on a wildlife mission – keep those peepers open to spot land iguanas and have a bit of fun bird-watching. , Santa Fe Island is like a hidden gem, with its volcanic rocks covered in a forest of giant Opuntia Cactus. After a breezy boat ride to the island, we're diving into two amazing snorkel spots along the coast. And guess who might join you? The playful Galapagos sea lions, along with a bunch of colorful reef fish and maybe even turtles, reef sharks, and rays. We're not done yet – time to hit the sandy shores of 'Playa Escondida' for a beach hangout. Keep those eyes peeled, 'cause Santa Fé's residents might show up: think land iguanas, Galapagos hawks, finches, doves, mockingbirds, rice rats, and even the friendly Galapagos snake. It's a wildlife party, and you're invited! Note: Lunch is onboard

This day use it wisely – maybe hit up the spots on Santa Cruz that you didn't catch on day one. Later in the afternoon, head to the harbor, where the ferry to San Cristobal Island sets sail at 2:00 pm. You'll cruise in and arrive around 4:00 pm – 4:30 pm, A member of our staff will be there to give you a warm island welcome. and helping you with information about what to do in San Cristobal – where to munch, and what to explore – they've got you covered. With the rest of the afternoon, you've got options: take a leisurely stroll along the boulevard and catch some alongside the snoozing sea lions, or head to one of the nearby beaches for a bit of chill time. It's your island getaway – the choice is all yours

It is a complete day of total adventure. Today you have to choose between two awesome spots – either Isla Lobos or Kicker Rock – based on what's available. No worries, whichever you pick, lunch is included and you will be back around 4:00 pm.

Enjoy your free morning before departing the Galapagos Islands. When it's time, we'll whisk you off to the San Cristobal Airport about 1.5 hours before your flight takes off. Wishing you the smoothest, safest travels ahead!
